abstract: Citigroup will reportedly issue as much as 100 billion yen ($940.6 million) in samurai bonds on July 1, its first such offering aimed at Japanese retail investors since 2000.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup will reportedly issue as much as 100 billion yen ($940.6 million) in samurai bonds on July 1, its first such offering aimed at Japanese retail investors since 2000.

headline.main: Citigroup to Issue $940 Million in Samurai Bonds, Report Says
